mapper.update:
update ju_ur_user
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mailBox = #{mailBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
identityCard = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userSign = #{userSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registTime = #{registTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
userImg = #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardImg = #{cardImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobileFlag = #{mobileFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mailFlag = #{mailFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastTime = #{lastTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clientInfo = #{clientInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userType = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginId = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupId = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fansQty = #{fansQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
followQty = #{followQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coverImg = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
income = #{income,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userFlag = #{userFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupFlag = #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUserId = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delFlag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ju_ur_user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mailBox = #{mailBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, identityCard = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userSign = #{userSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registTime = #{registTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userImg = #{userImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardImg = #{cardImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobileFlag = #{mobileFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mailFlag = #{mailFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastTime = #{lastTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientInfo = #{clientInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginId = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupId = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fansQty = #{fansQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, followQty = #{followQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coverImg = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income = #{income,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userFlag = #{userFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupFlag = #{groupFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateUserId = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from ju_ur_user where 1=1 and delFlag='0' and state='1'
select * from ju_ur_user where delFlag='0' and account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from ju_ur_user where 1=1
and delFlag='${delFlag}'
and state='${state}'
and (mobile = '${userName}' or mailBox = '${userName}' or loginId ='${userName}' or account = '${userName}' or userId='${userName}' )
select * from ju_ur_user where 1=1 and delFlag='0' and state='1' and userId= '${userId}'
SELECT ut.userId,ut.nickName FROM ju_ur_user_temp ut,ju_ur_user u WHERE ut.userId=u.userId AND u.delFlag='0' AND u.state='1' AND ut.mobile=#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from ju_ur_user where 1=1 and state='1' and delFlag='0'
and userId !='${userId}'
and (account='${condition}' or nickName like '%${condition}%' or mobile='${condition}')
select u.* from ju_ur_user_config c ,ju_ur_user u where c.userId='${userId}' and c.targetUserId=u.userId and upper(c.code)='${code}' and c.value='${value}'
SELECT * FROM ju_ur_user u WHERE u.delFlag='0' and u.mobile IN ('${mobiles}')
SELECT * FROM ju_ur_user u WHERE u.delFlag='0' and (u.mobile IN ('${mobileOrmails}') or u.mailBox IN ('${mobileOrmails}') )
